title: no support for Pixel phone in the Netherlands?
content:
Hello there, my Pixel sometimes reboots or it doesn't wake up from sleep.
Also the cable is not very tight in the port (anymore) it looks as if it is a bit more loose than before? 
I live in  the Netherlands, and now Google tells me that, because they don't officially sell these devices in the Netherlands, it is too bad and there is no support for me. 
For a company this big, it seems a bit odd to me?
Anyone?
